name: The Pettigrew Chronicles
overview: As secret agent Rupert Pettigrew, your task is to track down five other agents as well as the famed Safras sword. In four parts: The Searching - The Returning - The Discovery - The Conclusion. This is in part a compilation of Shard's two games Pettigrew's Diary and Operation Safras. Published in 64 Tape Computing Ekstranr. 2.
